body: r_c glare down at m_c with a scrowl. How pathetic. To think this was {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} mate. Hopefully, future ones wouldn't be as disappointing liked {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

With m_c gone from this world, r_c, to make {PRONOUN/r_c/self} not look daunting, dramatically woe {PRONOUN/m_c/self} with fake tears in the vigil. Hopefully, with the right amount of tears, a more preferable cat will betrothed {PRONOUN/r_c/object}

Driven with empathy and sorrow, Clanmates reached out to r_c, offering prey and a noble shoulder to cry on after the vigil of m_c. However, r_c simply turned down every sympathy; death comes for everyone, and it took its sweet time for m_c.

r_c held m_c in {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} paws during the vigil, weeping burning tears onto the cold, limp body. Even if things went sour throughout their lives, and r_c wanting nothing more but hiss at {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} dumb mate, deep down, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'ll miss m_c.

Near the end of m_c's vigil, Clanmates' eyes shifted towards r_c, moving aside for the widow to say {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} farewells. However, unlike what was expected, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} twisted {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} head soldemly, and, with an ice voice, stated {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} had nothing to say about {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} mate.

At the end of the vigil, after the tears were shed and the mourning sweepted throughout the Clan, r_c dragged {PRONOUN/r_c/self} straight into {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nest. m_c and r_c once share this nest, but now it's all {PRONOUN/r_c/inposs}. Despite only resurfacing horrible memories between the two, the nest felt... empty.

{PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} don't care what {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} Clanmates said on how {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} should behaved during m_c's vigil. Tears were meant for those {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} cared about, but m_c will never have a single drop from {PRONOUN/r_c/object}.
no_body: With the fading of days passed, it didn't take much for r_c to notice the sudden disappearace of m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} disappearance was like a StarClan's blessing. Thus, r_c won't squander this opportunity to have that longing taste of freedom without {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} mate breathing down {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} neck. And, with no body found to held a vigil, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} didn't need to weep, only celebrate.
